1a1('bum): @#/ /'bum cha pa bzhugs so//
1b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po brgya
1b2('bum): so gcig pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol
1b3('bum): tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi
1b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /shes
2a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod
2a2('bum): do| |phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yod do/ /don dam
2a3('bum): pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las
2a4('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid
2a5('bum): yod do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
2b1('bum): nyid yod do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos
2b2('bum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/ /rdzu 'phrul
2b3('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/ /dbang po rnams yod do/ /stobs rnams yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/ /'phags pa'i
2b4('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ /bsam gtan rnams yod do/ /tshad med pa
2b5('bum): rnams yod do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ /mthar gyis
2b6('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa
3a1('bum): med pa yod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/ /gzungs kyi
3a2('bum): sgo rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do/ /so so yang dag par
3a3('bum): rig pa rnams yod do/ /snying rje chen po yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
3a4('bum): bu yod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/ /rang
3a5('bum): byang chub yod do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams
3a6('bum): yod do| |lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/ /rang sangs
3b1('bum): rgyas rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
3b2('bum): yod do| |kau shi ka/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la
3b3('bum): las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka/ de ji
3b4('bum): snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang
3b5('bum): ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka/ de bas rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam bklag pa dang /
3b6('bum): bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi phal rol tu phyin pa 'di
3b7('bum): las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslab cing rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go /'jug
4a1('bum): par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob
4a2('bum): par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /thob
4a3('bum): bo| |'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems
4a4('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
4a5('bum): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka/ zag pa med pa'i chos
4a6('bum): de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
4a7('bum): phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang
4b1('bum): chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa
4b2('bum): nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa
4b3('bum): stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par sbong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang
4b4('bum): po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar
4b5('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams
4b6('bum): cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
4b7('bum): dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/ /kau shi ka/
5a1('bum): rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton
5a2('bum): du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
5a3('bum): pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs
5a4('bum): che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ /mtsho ma'i lha rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /
5a5('bum): 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor
5a6('bum): gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /kun snang dang ba'i
5a7('bum): lha rnams yod do/ /dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /che ba'i lha rnams
5b1('bum): yod do| |chung che'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /shin
5b2('bum): tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'og min gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye
5b3('bum): mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /
5b4('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol
5b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yod do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid yod
5b6('bum): do| |'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do/
5b7('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /ngo bo
6a1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/ /rdzu
6a2('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/ /dbang po rnams yod do/ /stobs rnams yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ /'phags
6a3('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ /bsam gtan rnams yod do/ /tshad med pa rnams yod do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ /
6a4('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa yod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting
6a5('bum): nge 'dzin rnams yod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/ /snying
6a6('bum): rje chen po yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
6a7('bum): yod do| |dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/ /rang byang chub yod do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /
6b1('bum): lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
6b2('bum): yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /kau shi ka/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
6b3('bum): snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon
6b4('bum): par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka/ de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
6b5('bum): mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka/ de bas rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i
6b6('bum): glegs bam bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol
6b7('bum): tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslab cing rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go /
7a1('bum): 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par
7a2('bum): gyur to| |thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob
7a3('bum): par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang
7a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
7a5('bum): so| |mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka/ zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol
7a6('bum): tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes
7a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /
7b1('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong
7b2('bum): pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med
7b3('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
7b4('bum): bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam
7b5('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin
7b6('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dris pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje
7b7('bum): chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/ /kau shi ka/ rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am/
8a1('bum): rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/
8a2('bum): de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher
8a3('bum): bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal
8a4('bum): chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod
8a5('bum): do| |gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs
8a6('bum): chen gyi lha rnams yod do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge ba'i lha
8a7('bum): rnams yod do/ /chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung che'i lha rnams yod do/ /
8b1('bum): tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /gya
8b2('bum): nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'og min gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /
8b3('bum): cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
8b4('bum): phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /
8b5('bum): nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yod do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus byas stong
8b6('bum): pa nyid yod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang bzhin
8b7('bum): stong pa nyid yod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /ngo bo nyid
9a1('bum): stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/ /rdzu
9a2('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/ /dbang po rnams yod do/ /stobs rnams yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ /
9a3('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ /bsam gtan rnams yod do/ /tshad med pa rnams yod do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar pa
9a4('bum): brgyad yod do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do/ /mngon par shes
9a5('bum): pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do/ /so so yang dag
9a6('bum): par rig pa rnams yod do/ /snying rje chen po yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'od pa'i 'bras bu yod
9a7('bum): do| |phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/ /rang byang chub yod do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ /rgyun du
9b1('bum): zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa'
9b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /kau shi ka/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
9b3('bum): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
9b4('bum): pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka/ de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/
9b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka/ de bas rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha
9b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar
9b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslab cing rigs bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par
10a1('bum): gyur to| |'jug go / 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
10a2('bum): bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob
10a3('bum): par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang
10a4('bum): chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /
10a5('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka/ zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
10a6('bum): dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol
10a7('bum): tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas
10b1('bum): stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid
10b2('bum): dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med
10b3('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
10b4('bum): bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu
10b5('bum): dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgro stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /
10b6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang /
10b7('bum): snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/ /kau shi ka/ rnam grangs des kyang rigs
11a1('bum): kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan
11a2('bum): la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams
11a3('bum): cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod
11a4('bum): do| |rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga'i
11a5('bum): lha rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams
11a6('bum): yod do| |tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod
11a7('bum): do| |dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung che'i
11b1('bum): lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams
11b2('bum): yod do| |gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'og min gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams
11b3('bum): yod do| |cung zad mang pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha
11b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//
11b5('bum): nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yod do/ /don dam ba stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus byas stong pa
11b6('bum): nyid yod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang bzhin stong
11b7('bum): pa nyid yod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa
12a1('bum): nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag ba rnams yod do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi
12a2('bum): rkang pa rnams yod do/ /dbang po rnams yod do/ /stobs rnams yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ /'phags pa'i
12a3('bum): bden pa rnams yod do/ /bsam gtan rnams yod do/ /tshad med pa rnams yod do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ /mthar
12a4('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /
12a5('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
12a6('bum): yod do| |snying rje chen po yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /phyir mi
12a7('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/ /rang byang chub yod do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs
12b1('bum): pa rnams yod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems
12b2('bum): dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ kau shi ka/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
12b3('bum): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms
12b4('bum): par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka/ de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel
12b5('bum): lam| gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka/ de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu
12b6('bum): mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i
12b7('bum): phyir zhe na/ kau sha ki/ de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslab cing rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu
13a1('bum): mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob
13a2('bum): par 'gyur ro/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /
13a3('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa lha rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang
13a4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
13a5('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka/ zag pa med pa'i chos
13a6('bum): de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
13a7('bum): dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
13b1('bum): dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa
13b2('bum): stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos
13b3('bum): po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /
13b4('bum): dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis
13b5('bum): gnas ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /
13b6('bum): gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
13b7('bum): dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/ /kau shi ka/
14a1('bum): rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing bklag pa dang / bri ba dang /
14a2('bum): kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ /de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol
14a3('bum): tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi
14a4('bum): rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams
14a5('bum): yod do| |'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs
14a6('bum): pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /kun
14a7('bum): snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /che ba'i lha
14b1('bum): rnams yod do/ /chung che'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod
14b2('bum): do| |shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'og min gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes
14b3('bum): mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
14b4('bum): phyin pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /
14b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yod do/ /don dam pa stong pa
14b6('bum): nyid yod do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dor ba med
14b7('bum): pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po
15a1('bum): med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/ /yang
15a2('bum): dag par spong ba rnams yod do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/ /dbang po rnams yod do/ /stobs rnams yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/ /'phags pa'i lam
15a3('bum): yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ /bsam gtan rnams yod do/ /tshad med pa rnams yod do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
15a4('bum): yod do| |rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa
15a5('bum): yod do| |mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams
15a6('bum): yod do| |so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/ /snying rje chen po yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ /lan
15a7('bum): gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/ /rang byang chub yod do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/ /rnam pa
15b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/ /rang sangs
15b2('bum): rgyas rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /kau shi
15b3('bum): ka/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad med pa
15b4('bum): bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka/ de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod
15b5('bum): nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ kau shi ka/ de bas rigs kyi
15b6('bum): bu'am| rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel
15b7('bum): lo| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslab cing rigs kyi bu'am/
16a1('bum): rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob
16a2('bum): par 'gyur ro/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom
16a3('bum): pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'
16a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go/ /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
16a5('bum): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka/ zag pa med pa'i chos de dag
16a6('bum): kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
16a7('bum): pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /
16b1('bum): chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong
16b2('bum): pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po
16b3('bum): med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi
16b4('bum): dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad
16b5('bum): dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge
16b6('bum): 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi
16b7('bum): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag
17a1('bum): kyang rgya cher bstan to/ /kau shi ka/ rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du
17a2('bum): bris shing bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi
17a3('bum): ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing
17a4('bum): mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ /mtshe ma'i lha
17a5('bum): rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs
17a6('bum): lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do//
17a7('bum): tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /
17b1('bum): dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung che'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi che ba'i lha rnams
17b2('bum): yod do| |mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'og min gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched
17b3('bum): kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha
17b4('bum): rnams yod do/ /sbyin ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bsam
17b5('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /
17b6('bum): chen po stong pa nyid yod do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang tha
17b7('bum): ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang gi mchan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /mi dmigs
18a1('bum): pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dran pa nye bar
18a2('bum): gzhag pa rnams yod do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/ /dbang po rnams yod do/ /stobs rnams yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
18a3('bum): yod do| |'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ /bsam gtan rnams yod do/ /tshad med pa rnams yod do/ /gzugs med pa'i
18a4('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
18a5('bum): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
18a6('bum): yod do| |mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/ /snying rje chen po yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs
18a7('bum): pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/ /rang byang chub yod do/ /lam gyi rnam par
18b1('bum): shes pa nyid yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /dgra bcom
18b2('bum): pa rnams yod do/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
18b3('bum): rgyas rnams yod do/ /kau shi ka/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam
18b4('bum): gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka/ de ji snyam du sems/ rigs
18b5('bum): kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis
18b6('bum): bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka/ de bas rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan
18b7('bum): la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bas zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/
19a1('bum): de dag la bslab cing rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun du zhugs
19a2('bum): pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras
19a3('bum): bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnams kyis rang byang chub
19a4('bum): thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go /
19a5('bum): 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
19a6('bum): rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka/ zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol
19a7('bum): tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi
19b1('bum): nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa
19b2('bum): stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /
19b3('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag
19b4('bum): par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden
19b5('bum): pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par
19b6('bum): shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
19b7('bum): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med
20a1('bum): pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/ /kau shi ka/ rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam
20a2('bum): du bris shing bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/
20a3('bum): de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing
20a4('bum): mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ /mtshe ma'i lha
20a5('bum): rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs lha
20a6('bum): nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad
20a7('bum): med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge
20b1('bum): rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung che'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi che ba'i lha rnams yod
20b2('bum): do| |mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'og min gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched
20b3('bum): kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha
20b4('bum): rnams yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bsam gtan
20b5('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /chen
20b6('bum): po stong pa nyid yod do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma
20b7('bum): med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /mi dmigs
21a1('bum): pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dran pa nye bar
21a2('bum): gzhag pa rnams yod do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/ /dbang po rnams yod do/ /stobs rnams yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
21a3('bum): yod do| |'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ /bsam gtan rnams yod do/ /tshad med pa rnams yod do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms
21a4('bum): par 'jug pa rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
21a5('bum): med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
21a6('bum): yod do| |mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do/ /so so yang dag par rigs pa rnams yod do/ /snying rje chen po yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs
21a7('bum): pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/ /rang byang chub yod do/ /lam gyi rnam pa
21b1('bum): shes pa nyid yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /dgra
21b2('bum): bcom pa rnams yod do/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
21b3('bum): rgyas rnams yod do/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po brgya so gnyis pa/ kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
21b4('bum): gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang du
21b5('bum): 'phel gyi/ dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi
21b6('bum): dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod pas ni/ ma yin no/ /gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa dang /
21b7('bum): bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod pas ni/ ma yin no/ /stong gi 'jig rten gyi
22a1('bum): khams kyi sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms
22a2('bum): par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod pas ni/ ma yin no/ /stong gnyis kyi 'jigs rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam
22a3('bum): la bkod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod pas ni/ ma yin no/ /stong
22a4('bum): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs
22a5('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod pas ni/ ma yin no/ /de la tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa ni/ 'di yin te/ gnyis la spyod pa'ang
22a6('bum): ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par byad pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / tshul bzhin du
22a7('bum): yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang /
22b1('bum): 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin
22b2('bum): pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i
22b3('bum): blos bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis
22b4('bum): pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis
22b5('bum): la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / tshul bzhin
22b6('bum): du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos nang stong pa nyid 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog
22b7('bum): pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos phyi stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis
23a1('bum): la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos phyi nang stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang
23a2('bum): ma yin| mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos stong pa nyid stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyad pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang
23a3('bum): ma yin pa'i blos chen po stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos don dam pa stong pa nyid
23a4('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos 'dus byas stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis
23a5('bum): la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis
23a6('bum): pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i
23a7('bum): blos thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos dor ba med pa stong pa
23b1('bum): nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos rang bzhin stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis
23b2('bum): la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos chos thams cad stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la
23b3('bum): spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos mi dmigs
23b4('bum): pa stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos dngos po med pa stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /
23b5('bum): gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la
23b6('bum): spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos
23b7('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos yang dag par spong ba rnams tshul
24a1('bum): bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams tshul bzhin
24a2('bum): du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos dbang po rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma
24a3('bum): yin| mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos stobs rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i
24a4('bum): blos byang chub kyi yan lag rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos 'phags pa'i lam yan
24a5('bum): lag brgyad pa tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams tshul bzhin du
24a6('bum): yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos bsam gtan rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma
24a7('bum): yin| mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos tshad med pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin
24b1('bum): pa'i blos gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos rnam par thar
24b2('bum): pa brgyad tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu tshul bzhin
24b3('bum): du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa
24b4('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos mngon par shes pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis
24b5('bum): la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos ting nge 'dzin rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la
24b6('bum): spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos gzungs kyi sgo rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos de bzhin gshegs
24b7('bum): pa'i stobs rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos mi 'jigs pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la
25a1('bum): byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos so so yang dag par rig pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la
25a2('bum): byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos snying rje chen po tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi
25a3('bum): gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod
25a4('bum): pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos thams cad shes pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos lam gyi
25a5('bum): rnam pa shes pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tshul
25a6('bum): bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rnam grangs du mar rgya cher
25a7('bum): rjod cing ston la 'chad cing 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed la yang dag par ston cing de'i don gtan la dbab par ston par byed na/ kau shi ka/ de la shes
25b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don ni/ 'di yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gnyis su lta ba ma yin/ gnyis su med par lta ba ma yin/ mtshan mar ma yin/ mtshan ma
25b2('bum): med par ma yin/ blang bar ma yin/ dor bar ma yin/ dbri bar ma yin/ bsnan par ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs par ma yin/ rnam par byang bar ma yin/ skye bar ma yin/
25b3('bum): 'gag par ma yin/ gzung bar ma yin/ mi gzung bar ma yin/ len par ma yin/ dor bar ma yin/ gnas bar ma yin/ mi gnas par ma yin/ yang dag par ma yin/
25b4('bum): log par ma yin/ ldan par ma yin/ mi ldan par ma yin/ 'dre bar ma yin/ mi 'dre bar ma yin/ rkyen du ma yin/ rkyen med par ma yin/ chos su ma yin/ chos ma
25b5('bum): yin par ma yin/ de bzhin nyid du ma yin/ de bzhin nyid ma yin par ma yin/ yang dag pa'i mthar ma yin/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ma yin par ma yin te/ rigs kyi bu'am/
25b6('bum): rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher rjod cing ston la 'chad cing 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed la yang dag par ston par
25b7('bum): byed cing / de'i don gtan la dbab par ston par byed na/ bsod nams mang du 'phel gyi/ bdag 'ba' zhig gis bzung ba'am/ kun chub par byas pa'am/ bcangs pa'am/
26a1('bum): bklags pa'am/ tshul bzhin du yid la byas pas ni/ ma yin no/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig bdag
26a2('bum): nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin cing kun chub par byed de/ 'chang zhing klog la tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / de gzhan la'ang rgya cher rjod cing ston la 'chad cing
26a3('bum): 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed la yang dag par ston par byed cing / de'i don gtan la dbab par ston par byed na/ kau shi ka/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi
26a4('bum): bu mo de'i bsod nams ni/ shin tu mang du 'phel lo/ /brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de
26a5('bum): ltar don dang ldan la yi ge dang ldan par bstan par bgyi'am/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu
26a6('bum): phyin pa de ltar don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par bstan par byas te/ kau shi ka/ de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo ni/ bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med grangs
26a7('bum): med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka/ gal te rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las shar phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
26b1('bum): sangs rgyas tshad med grangs med pa dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan
26b2('bum): dang | sil snyan rnam pa sna tshogs dang / bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa dang / bkur stir byas pa dang / phu dud du byas pa dang / mchod pa byas pa bas/ kau shi ka/
26b3('bum): rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rnam grangs du mar brjod de bstan pa dang /
26b4('bum): bshad de bkrol zhing / rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams 'di ni/ ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe
26b5('bum): na| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslab ste 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis
26b6('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /kau shi
26b7('bum): ka| gal te rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las lho phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med grangs med pa dag la nam
27a1('bum): 'tsho'i bar du me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan
27a2('bum): rnam pa sna tshogs dang / bde pa'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa dang / bkur stir byas pa dang / phu dud du byas pa dang / mchod pa byas pa bas/ kau shi ka/ rigs kyi
27a3('bum): bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rnam grangs du mar brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad
27a4('bum): de bkrol zhing / rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams 'di ni/ ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir
27a5('bum): zhe na| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslab ste 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
27a6('bum): rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
27a7('bum): 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka/ gal te rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las nub phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med
27b1('bum): grangs med pa dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs
27b2('bum): dang / bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa dang / bkur stir byas pa dang / phu dud du byas pa dang / mchod pa byas pa bas/ kau shi ka/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la
27b3('bum): zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rnam grangs du mar brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal
27b4('bum): ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams 'di ni/ ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
27b5('bum): phyin pa 'di la bslab ste 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag
27b6('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka/ gal te rigs
27b7('bum): kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las byang phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med grangs med pa dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du me tog
28a1('bum): dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs dang /
28a2('bum): bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa dang / bkur stir byas pa dang / phu dud du byas pa dang / mchod pa byas pa bas/ kau shi ka/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la
28a3('bum): zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rnam grangs du mar brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste
28a4('bum): gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams 'di ni/ ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
28a5('bum): phyin pa 'di la bslab ste 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla na med pa yang
28a6('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka/ gal te
28a7('bum): rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med grangs med pa
28b1('bum): dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs dang / bde
28b2('bum): ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa dang / bkur stir byas pa dang / phu dud du byas pa dang / mchod pa byas pa pas/ /kau shi ka/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig
28b3('bum): gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rnam grangs du mar brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba
28b4('bum): dang | yang dag par bstan pa byas na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams 'di ni/ ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la
28b5('bum): bslab ste 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
28b6('bum): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka/ gal te rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs
28b7('bum): k yi bu mo la las shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med grangs med pa dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du me tog
29a1('bum): dang / phreng pa dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs dang / bde
29a2('bum): ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa dang / bkur stir byas pa dang / phu dud du byas pa dang / mchod pa byas pa bas/ kau shi ka/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la
29a3('bum): zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rnam grangs du mar brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol shing rnam par
29a4('bum): phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams 'di ni/ ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
29a5('bum): phyin pa 'di la bslab ste 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla na med pa
29a6('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka/
29a7('bum): gal te rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med grangs med
29b1('bum): pa dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du me tog dang / phreng pa dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs dang /
29b2('bum): bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa dang / bkur stir byas pa dang / phu dud du byas pa dang / mchod pa byas pa bas/ kau shi ka/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la
29b3('bum): zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rnam grangs du mar brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste
29b4('bum): gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ /rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams 'di ni/ ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab
29b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslab ste 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla na med
29b6('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka/ gal
29b7('bum): te rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med grangs med pa dag
30a1('bum): la nam 'tsho'i bar du me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan
30a2('bum): dang / sil snyan sna tshogs dang / bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa dang / bkur stir byas pa dang / phu dud du byas pa dang / mchod pa byas pa bas/ kau shi ka/
30a3('bum): rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rnam grangs du mar brjod de bstan
30a4('bum): pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams 'di ni/ chos mang du 'phel
30a5('bum): lo| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslab ste 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
30a6('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs
30a7('bum): par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka/ gal te rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las 'og gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
30b1('bum): sangs rgyas tshad med grangs med pa dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang /
30b2('bum): sil snyan sna tshogs dang / bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa dang / bkur stir byas pa dang / phu dud du byas pa dang / mchod pa byas pa bas/ kau shi ka/ rigs kyi
30b3('bum): bu'am| rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rnam grangs du mar brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de
30b4('bum): bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams 'di ni/ ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes
30b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslab ste 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla na
30b6('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka/
30b7('bum): gal te rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las 'og gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med grangs med pa dag la nam
31a1('bum): 'tsho'i bar du me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang /
31a2('bum): sil snyan sna tshogs dang / bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa dang / bkur stir byas pa dang / phu dud du byas pa dang / mchod pa byas pa bas/ kau shi ka/
31a3('bum): rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rnam grangs du mar brjod de bstan
31a4('bum): pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing / rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams 'di ni/ ches mang
31a5('bum): du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslab ste 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
31a6('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /
31a7('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las bskal pa tshad med grangs med par dmigs pa'i
31b1('bum): tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / bskal pa tshad med grangs med par dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / bskal pa
31b2('bum): tshad med grangs med par dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / bskal pa tshad med grangs med par dmigs pa'i tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
31b3('bum): tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / bskal pa tshad med grangs med par dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / bskal pa tshad med grangs med par dmigs
31b4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa bas ni/ gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gzhan
31b5('bum): la rgya cher brjod cing ston la/ 'chad cing rnam par 'god pa dang / rab tu 'god cing rnam par 'byed la/ gsal bar byed cing yang dag par ston pa byed na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang
31b6('bum): du 'phel lo/ /de la dmigs pa ni/ 'di yin te/ kau shi ka/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa gtong zhing 'di snyam du bdag ni/ sbyin pa gtong ngo / /
31b7('bum): sbyin pa ni/ 'di gtong ngo / /'di la ni/ sbyin pa bya'o/ /snyam na/ des sbyin pa de ltar btang bas sbyin pa nyid du 'gyur gyi/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/ /dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
32a1('bum): tshul khrims srung zhing 'di snyam du bdag ni/ tshul khrims srung ngo / /tshul khrims ni/ 'di srung ngo / snyam na/ des tshul khrims de ltar bsrungs pas
32a2('bum): tshul khrims nyid du 'gyur gyi/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/ /dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bzod pa sgom zhing 'di snyam du bdag ni/ bzod pa sgom mo/ /bzod pa
32a3('bum): ni| 'di sgom mo/ /snyam na/ des bzod pa de ltar bsgoms pas bzod pa nyid du 'gyur gyi/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/ /dmigs pa'i tshul gyis brtson 'grus
32a4('bum): rtsom zhing 'di snyam du bdag ni/ brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /'di'i don du brtson 'grus rtsam mo/ /snyam na/ des brtson 'grus de ltar brtsams pas brtson 'grus nyid du 'gyur
32a5('bum): gyi| brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/ /dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan rnams la snyoms par 'jug cing 'di snyam du bdag ni/ bsam gtan rnams la
32a6('bum): snyoms par 'jug go / bsam gtan ni/ 'di dag la mnyam par gzhag go/ snyam na/ des bsam gtan la de ltar mnyam par gzhag pas bsam gtan nyid du 'gyur gyi/
32a7('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/ /dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab sgom zhing 'di snyam du bdag ni/ shes rab sgom mo/ /shes rab ni/ 'di sgom mo/ /snyam na/
32b1('bum): des shes rab de ltar bsgoms pas shes rab nyid du 'gyur gyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/ /kau shi ka/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ltar dmigs pa la spyod
32b2('bum): pas ni| sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
