57b1('bum): rtog pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid mi sdug go/ zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid mi rtag go/
57b2('bum): zhes bya bar ston/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar ston/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar ston/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi sdug go/ zhes
57b3('bum): bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya
57b4('bum): bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /'dus byas stong
57b5('bum): pa nyid mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi rtag go/ zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar
57b6('bum): rtog pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi sdug go/ zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs
57b7('bum): brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi rtag go/ zhes bya bar ston/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar ston/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
58a1('bum): bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar ston/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi sdug go/ zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol
58a2('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya
58a3('bum): bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /'dus ma byas stong ba nyid mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag 'dus
58a4('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid mi rtag go/ zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bdag med do/ /zhes bya
58a5('bum): bar rtog pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi sdug go/ zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
58a6('bum): nyid mi rtag go/ zhes bya bar ston/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar ston/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar ston/ mtha'
58a7('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi sdug go/ zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang
58b1('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
58b2('bum): nyid bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi rtag go/ zhes
58b3('bum): bya bar rtog pa dang / mtha' yas 'das pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / mtha' las
58b4('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid mi sdug go/ zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag go/ zhes
58b5('bum): bya bar ston/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar ston/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar ston/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
58b6('bum): mi sdug go/ /zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
58b7('bum): mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar rtog
59a1('bum): par 'gyur ro/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag go/
59a2('bum): zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar rtog
59a3('bum): pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi sdug go/ zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid
59a4('bum): mi rtag go/ zhes bya bar ston/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar ston/ dor ba med pa stong ba nyid bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar ston/ dor ba med pa stong
59a5('bum): ba nyid mi sdug go/ zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang dor ba med
59a6('bum): pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar rtog
59a7('bum): par 'gyur ro/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag go/ zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dor ba med pa stong
59b1('bum): pa nyid sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi sdug go/ zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes
59b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi rtag go/ zhes bya bar ston/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar
59b3('bum): ston| rang bzhin stong pa nyid bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar ston/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi sdug go/ zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol
59b4('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par
59b5('bum): 'gyur ro/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag rang bzhin stong pa nyid
59b6('bum): mi rtag go / zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rang
59b7('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid mi sdug go/ zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi rtag go/ zhes
60a1('bum): bya bar ston/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar ston/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar ston/ chos thams
60a2('bum): cad stong pa nyid mi sdug go/ zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang chos
60a3('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid bdag med
60a4('bum): cas bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi rtag go /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /
60a5('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid
60a6('bum): mi sdug go / zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag go /zhes bya bar ston/
60a7('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar ston/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar ston/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi sdug
60b1('bum): go / zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi
60b2('bum): rtag zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar rtog par
60b3('bum): 'gyur ro/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag go /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rang gi mtshan
60b4('bum): nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi sdug go /zhes
60b5('bum): bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi rtag go /zhes bya bar ston/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal
60b6('bum): lo| |zhes bya bar ston/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar ston/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi sdug go /zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/
60b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid
61a1('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi
61a2('bum): sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi rtag go /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya
61a3('bum): bar rtog pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi sdug go /zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol
61a4('bum): tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag go /zhes bya bar ston/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar ston/
61a5('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar ston/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi sdug go /zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha
61a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /zhes brjod do/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal
61a7('bum): zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de
61b1('bum): ltar de dag dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag go / zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bdag
61b2('bum): med do/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi sdug go /zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /ngo bo nyid
61b3('bum): stong pa nyid mi rtag go / zhes bya bar ston/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar ston/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar ston/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi sdug
61b4('bum): go / zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces
61b5('bum): bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi sdug
61b6('bum): ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag go /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / ngo bo nyid
61b7('bum): stong pa nyid bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi sdug go /zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur
62a1('bum): ro| |dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag go / zhes bya bar ston/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar ston/
62a2('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar ston/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi sdug go /zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod
62a3('bum): pa ni| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /dngos
62a4('bum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /dngos po med pa'i
62a5('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag go /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
62a6('bum): stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
62a7('bum): nyid mi sdug go / zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi rtag go /zhes bya bar
62b1('bum): ston/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar ston/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar ston/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi sdug
62b2('bum): go / zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
62b3('bum): mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar rtog par
62b4('bum): 'gyur ro/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi rtag go /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dran pa nye
62b5('bum): bar gzhag pa rnams sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi sdug go/
62b6('bum): zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams mi rtag go /zhes bya bar ston/ yang dag par spong ba rnams
62b7('bum): sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar ston/ yang dag par spong ba rnams bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar ston/ yang dag par spong ba rnams mi sdug go /zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang
63a1('bum): de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams mi rtog ces
63a2('bum): bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur
63a3('bum): ro| |yang dag par spong ba rnams mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag yang dag par spong ba rnams mi rtag go /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / yang dag par spong ba
63a4('bum): rnams sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams mi sdug go /zhes bya bar
63a5('bum): rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi rtag go /zhes bya bar ston/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sdug
63a6('bum): bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar ston/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar ston/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi sdug go /zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang
63a7('bum): de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur
63b1('bum): ro| |rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi sdug
63b2('bum): ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi rtag go /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /
63b3('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi sdug go /zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan
63b4('bum): la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /dbang bo rnams mi rtag go /zhes bya bar ston/ dbang po rnams sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar ston/ dbang po rnams bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar ston/
63b5('bum): dbang po rnams mi sdug go /zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang dbang
63b6('bum): po rnams mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /dbang po rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /dbang po rnams bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /dbang
63b7('bum): po rnams mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag dbang po rnams mi rtag go /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dbang po rnams sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /
64a1('bum): dbang po rnams bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dbang po rnams mi sdug go /zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
64a2('bum): gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /stobs rnams mi rtag go /zhes bya bar ston/ stobs rnams sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar ston/ stobs rnams bdag med do/ /zhes
64a3('bum): bya bar ston/ stobs rnams mi sdug go /zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de
64a4('bum): dag kyang stobs rnams mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /stobs rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /stobs rnams bdag med ces bya bar rtog par
64a5('bum): 'gyur ro/ /stobs rnams mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag stobs rnams mi rtag go /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / stobs rnams sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya
64a6('bum): bar rtog pa dang / stobs rnams bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / stobs rnams mi sdug go /zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la
64a7('bum): spyod par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi rtag go /zhes bya bar ston/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar ston/ byang chub kyi yan lag
64b1('bum): rnams bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar ston/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi sdug go /zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
64b2('bum): la spyod do/ /zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya
64b3('bum): bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar
64b4('bum): de dag byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi rtag go / zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
64b5('bum): rnams bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi sdug go /zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod
64b6('bum): par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi rtag go /zhes bya bar ston/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar ston/ 'phags
64b7('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar ston/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi sdug go /zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod
65a1('bum): pa ni| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
65a2('bum): pa mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag
65a3('bum): brgyad pa bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag 'phags pa'i
65a4('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa mi rtag go / zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'phags pa'i
65a5('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi sdug go /zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
65a6('bum): phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi rtag go /zhes bya bar ston/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya
65a7('bum): bar ston/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar ston/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi sdug go /zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar
65b1('bum): spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /'phags
65b2('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
65b3('bum): mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi rtag go /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sdug bsngal lo//
65b4('bum): zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi sdug go /zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes
65b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan rnams mi rtag go /zhes bya bar ston/ bsam gtan rnams sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar ston/
65b6('bum): bsam gtan rnams bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar ston/ bsam gtan rnams mi sdug go /zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
65b7('bum): pa la spyod do/ /zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang bsam gtan rnams mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par
66a1('bum): 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan rnams bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan rnams mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar
66a2('bum): de dag bsam gtan rnams mi rtag go / zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / bsam gtan rnams sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / bsam gtan rnams bdag med do//
66a3('bum): zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / bsam gtan rnams mi sdug go /zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /tshad med
66a4('bum): pa rnams mi rtag go / zhes bya bar ston/ tshad med pa rnams sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar ston/ tshad med pa rnams bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar ston/ tshad med pa rnams
66a5('bum): mi sdug go / zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang tshad med pa rnams
66a6('bum): mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /tshad med pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /tshad med pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /tshad med
66a7('bum): pa rnams mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag tshad med pa rnams mi rtag go /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / tshad med pa rnams sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar
66b1('bum): rtog pa dang / tshad med pa rnams bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / tshad med pa rnams mi sdug go /zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par
66b2('bum): 'gyur ro/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi rtag go/ zhes bya bar ston/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar ston/ gzugs
66b3('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar ston/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi sdug go /zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de
66b4('bum): ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par
66b5('bum): 'gyur ro/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar rtog
66b6('bum): par 'gyur ro/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi rtag go /zhes
66b7('bum): bya bar rtog pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bdag med do//
67a1('bum): zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi sdug go /zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs
67a2('bum): brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa rnams mi rtag go /zhes bya bar ston/ rnam par thar pa rnams sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar ston/ rnam par thar pa rnams bdag
67a3('bum): med do| / zhes bya bar ston/ rnam par thar pa rnams mi sdug go /zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /zhes brjod
67a4('bum): de| su la bstan pa de dag kyang rnam par thar pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /rnam par
67a5('bum): thar pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa rnams mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag rnam par thar pa rnams mi rtag go /zhes
67a6('bum): bya bar rtog pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rnam par thar
67a7('bum): pa rnams mi rtag go / zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
67b1('bum): rnams mi rtag go / zhes bya bar ston/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar ston/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
67b2('bum): bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar ston/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi sdug go/ /zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha
67b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /mthar gyis gnas
67b4('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /mthar
67b5('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi rtag go /zhes bya bar rtog pa
67b6('bum): dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar
67b7('bum): rtog pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi sdug go /zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /rnam
68a1('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi rtag go /zhes bya bar ston/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
68a2('bum): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar ston/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bdag med do/ /zhes bya
68a3('bum): bar ston/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi sdug go /zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes
68a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi rtag ces
68a5('bum): bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo
68a6('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa
68a7('bum): med pa mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi rtag go /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /
68b1('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang
68b2('bum): smon pa med pa bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi sdug go /zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes
68b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod bar 'gyur ro/ /mngon par shes pa rnams mi rtag go /zhes bya bar ston/ mngon par shes pa rnams sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar
68b4('bum): ston| mngon par shes pa rnams bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar ston/ mngon par shes pa rnams mi sdug go /zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi
68b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang mngon par shes pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /mngon par shes pa rnams sdug bsngal
68b6('bum): zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /mngon par shes pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /mngon par shes pa rnams mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de
68b7('bum): dag mngon par shes pa rnams mi rtag go / zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams bdag
69a1('bum): med do/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams mi sdug go /zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan
69a2('bum): la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams mi rtag go /zhes bya bar ston/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar ston/ ting nge 'dzin rnams bdag med do/ /zhes
69a3('bum): bya bar ston/ ting nge 'dzin rnams mi sdug go /zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /zhes brjod de/ su la
69a4('bum): bstan pa de dag kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams
69a5('bum): bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag ting nge 'dzin rnams mi rtag go /zhes bya bar rtog pa
69a6('bum): dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams mi sdug go/
69a7('bum): zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi rtag go /zhes bya bar ston/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams
69b1('bum): sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar ston/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar ston/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi sdug go/ zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar
69b2('bum): spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /gzungs kyi sgo
69b3('bum): rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur
69b4('bum): ro| |de ltar de dag gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi rtag go/ zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag
69b5('bum): med do/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi sdug go /zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs
69b6('bum): pa'i stobs rnams mi rtag go / zhes bya bar ston/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar ston/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bdag med
69b7('bum): do| |zhes bya bar ston/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mi sdug go /zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
70a1('bum): spyod do| |zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs
70a2('bum): pa'i stobs rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
70a3('bum): rnams mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mi rtag go /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
70a4('bum): sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mi sdug
70a5('bum): go / zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams mi rtag go /zhes bya bar ston/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sdug
70a6('bum): bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar ston/ mi 'jigs pa rnams bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar ston/ mi 'jigs pa rnams mi sdug go /zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa
70a7('bum): ni| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams
70b1('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar
70b2('bum): de dag mi 'jigs pa rnams mi rtag go / zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa
70b3('bum): dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams mi sdug go/ zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu
70b4('bum): phyin pa stong phrag brgya ba/ /bam po brgya so bzhi pa/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi rtag go/ zhes bya bar ston/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar
70b5('bum): ston/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar ston/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi sdug go /zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes
70b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /so so yang dag par rig pa
70b7('bum): rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar rtag par 'gyur ro/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi sdug ces bya bar rtog
71a1('bum): gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi rtag go/ zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes
71a2('bum): bya bar rtog pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi sdug go/ zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab
71a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /snying rje chen po mi rtag go/ zhes bya bar ston/ snying rje chen po sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar ston/ snying rje chen po bdag
71a4('bum): med do| |zhes bya bar ston/ snying rje chen po mi sdug go /zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /zhes brjod de/
71a5('bum): su la bstan pa de dag kyang snying rje chen po mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /snying rje chen po sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /snying rje chen po bdag med ces bya
71a6('bum): bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /snying rje chen po mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag snying rje chen po mi rtag go /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / snying rje chen po sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya
71a7('bum): bar rtog pa dang / snying rje chen po bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / snying rje chen po mi sdug go /zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la
71b1('bum): spyod par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi rtag go/ zhes bya bar ston/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar ston/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
71b2('bum): 'dres pa rnams bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar ston/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi sdug go/ zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
71b3('bum): pa la spyod do/ /zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sdug bsngal
71b4('bum): zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /
71b5('bum): de ltar de dag sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi rtag go /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / sangs rgyas
71b6('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi sdug go/ zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs
71b7('bum): brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi rtag go/ zhes bya bar ston/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar ston/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
72a1('bum): bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar ston/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi sdug go /zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha
72a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sdug bsngal
72a3('bum): zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar
72a4('bum): de dag rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi rtag go / zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
72a5('bum): bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi sdug go /zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /
72a6('bum): lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi rtag go /zhes bya bar ston/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar ston/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
72a7('bum): bu bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar ston/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi sdug go /zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
72b1('bum): pa la spyod do/ /zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sdug bsngal zhes
72b2('bum): bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /
72b3('bum): de ltar de dag lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi rtag go/ zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong
72b4('bum): ba'i 'bras bu bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi sdug go /zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par
72b5('bum): 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi rtag go /zhes bya bar ston/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar ston/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bdag med do/ /zhes
72b6('bum): bya bar ston/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi sdug go /zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /zhes brjod de/ su la
72b7('bum): bstan pa de dag kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras
73a1('bum): bu bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras
73a2('bum): bu mi rtag go / zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa
73a3('bum): dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi sdug go /zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid mi rtag go /zhes
73a4('bum): bya bar ston/ dgra bcom pa nyid sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar ston/ dgra bcom pa nyid bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar ston/ dgra bcom pa nyid mi sdug go /zhes bya bar ston
73a5('bum): cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /zhes brjod do/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang dgra bcom pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar rtog
73a6('bum): par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid mi sdug
73a7('bum): ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag dgra bcom pa nyid mi rtag go /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /
73b1('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid mi sdug go /zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par
73b2('bum): 'gyur ro/ /rang byang chub mi rtag go /zhes bya bar ston/ rang byang chub sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar ston/ rang byang chub bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar ston/ rang byang chub mi sdug go /zhes bya
73b3('bum): bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang rang byang chub mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur
73b4('bum): ro| |rang byang chub sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /rang byang chub bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /rang byang chub mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar
73b5('bum): de dag rang byang chub mi rtag go / zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rang byang chub sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rang byang chub bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rang byang
73b6('bum): chub mi sdug go / zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi rtag go /zhes bya bar ston/
73b7('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar ston/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar ston/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi sdug go /zhes
74a1('bum): bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang lam gyi rnam pa
74a2('bum): shes pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya par rtog par 'gyur ro/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar
74a3('bum): rtog par 'gyur ro/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi rtag go /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / lam gyi
74a4('bum): rnam pa shes pa nyid sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi sdug go /
74a5('bum): zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi rtag go /zhes bya bar ston/ rnam pa thams
74a6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar ston/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar ston/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi sdug go /zhes
74a7('bum): bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
74b1('bum): nyid mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar rtog
74b2('bum): par 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi rtag go /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rnam pa thams
74b3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag med do/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi sdug go /
74b4('bum): zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur te/ kau shi ka /de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan no/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan
74b5('bum): yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston na 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig /khyod kyis shes rab
74b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms dang byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa dang / sa gsum pa dang / sa bzhi pa dang / sa lnga pa dang /
74b7('bum): sa drug pa dang / sa bdun pa dang / sa brgyad pa dang / sa dgu pa dang / sa bcu pa la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /tshur rigs kyi bu bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig /khyod kyis
75a1('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms dang byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa dang /
75a2('bum): sa gsum pa dang / sa bzhi pa dang / sa lnga pa dang / sa drug pa dang / sa bdun pa dang / sa brgyad pa dang / sa dgu pa dang / sa bcu pa la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /tshur rigs
75a3('bum): kyi bu brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig / khyod kyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub
75a4('bum): sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa dang / sa gsum pa dang / sa bzhi pa dang / sa lnga pa dang / sa drug pa dang / sa bdun pa dang / sa brgyad pa dang / sa dgu pa dang / sa bcu pa la gnas
75a5('bum): par 'gyur ro/ /tshur rigs kyi bu bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig /khyod kyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas
75a6('bum): par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa dang / sa gsum pa dang / sa bzhi pa dang / sa lnga pa dang / sa drug pa dang / sa bdun pa dang / sa brgyad pa dang / sa dgu pa
75a7('bum): dang / sa bcu pa la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /tshur rigs kyi bu tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig /khyod kyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms dang / byang chub
75b1('bum): sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa dang / sa gsum pa dang / sa bzhi pa dang / sa lnga pa dang / sa drug pa dang / sa bdun pa dang / sa
75b2('bum): brgyad pa dang / sa dgu pa dang / sa bcu pa la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /tshur rigs kyi bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig /khyod kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms dang /
75b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa dang / sa gsum pa dang sa bzhi pa dang / sa lnga pa dang / sa drug pa dang / sa
75b4('bum): bdun pa dang / sa brgyad pa dang / sa dgu pa dang / sa bcu pa la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /zhes de'ang mtshan ma'i tshul dang / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston te/ de'i dus
75b5('bum): kyi 'du shes kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom par 'gyur te/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan no/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs
75b6('bum): kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur
75b7('bum): rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig / rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms dang / nyan thos kyis las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /rang
76a1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes ston te/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan no/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan
76a2('bum): yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston na 'di ltar
76a3('bum): ston te| tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig / rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms dang / byang chub sems
76a4('bum): dpa'i skyon med par 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /khyod kyis de ltar mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa dang byang chub sems
76a5('bum): dpa'i mngon par shes pa la gnas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud
76a6('bum): dang / mchod pa byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i
76a7('bum): theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la ston na 'di skad ston te/ rigs kyi bu dag /su shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin cing / 'chang ba dang / klog
76b1('bum): cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de ni/ bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med grangs med dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/ /zhes zer te/ rigs kyi bu'am
76b2('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag la ston na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i
76b3('bum): theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
76b4('bum): p ar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis thugs dang po bskyed ba nas phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar gyi dge ba'i
76b5('bum): rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus te/ rjes su dga' bar gyis la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngos shig /ces rigs
76b6('bum): kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la de ltar ston cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to/ /brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar ston na/ rigs kyi
76b7('bum): bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston pa
77a1('bum): lags| bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka/ de bas na rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i
77a2('bum): rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig /gzugs
77a3('bum): mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs ni/ rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ gzugs kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /
77a4('bum): dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ gzugs rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi
77a5('bum): dmigs so/ /de la gzugs nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka/ de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag
77a6('bum): ni| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu
77a7('bum): dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar
77b1('bum): yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshor ba ni/ rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ tshor ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang yin pa
77b2('bum): de ni| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ tshor ba rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/ /de la tshor ba nyid kyang
77b3('bum): med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag ba lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka /de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi
77b4('bum): ston to/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
77b5('bum): pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig /'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'du
77b6('bum): shes ni/ rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ 'du shes kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab
77b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ 'du shes rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/ /de la 'du shes nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces
78a1('bum): ston te/ kau shi ka/ de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/ /
78a2('bum): kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
78a3('bum): pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig /'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
78a4('bum): 'du byed ni/ rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ 'du byed kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes
78a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ 'du byed rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/ /de la 'du byed nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod
78a6('bum): ces ston te/ kau shi ka/ de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang
78a7('bum): rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur
78b1('bum): rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su lta zhig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin
78b2('bum): gyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
78b3('bum): pa gang yin pa de la ni/ rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/ /de la rnam par shes pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yid ces
78b4('bum): ston te/ kau shi ka/ de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi
78b5('bum): bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis
78b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig / mig mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig ni/ rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ mig gi rang bzhin
78b7('bum): gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ mig rtag
79a1('bum): ces bya ba mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/ /de la mig nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka/ de ltar
79a2('bum): ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de
79a3('bum): dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab
79a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig / rna ba mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rna ba ni/ rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rna ba'i rang bzhin gang yin
79a5('bum): pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ rna ba rtag ces bya
79a6('bum): ba'am| mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/ /de la rna ba nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka/ de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi
79a7('bum): bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i
79b1('bum): theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig /
79b2('bum): sna mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sna ni/ rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ sna'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa
79b3('bum): gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ sna rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/ /de la sna
79b4('bum): nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka/ de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
79b5('bum): gzugs brnyan mi ston to/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la
79b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig /lce mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/
79b7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lce ni/ rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ lce'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
80a1('bum): ste| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ lce rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/ /de la lce nyid kyang med na/
80a2('bum): rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka/ de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi
80a3('bum): ston to/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu
80a4('bum): phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig /lus mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig /de ci'i phyir zhe na /
80a5('bum): lus ni/ rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ lus kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab
80a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ lus rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/ /de la lus nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod
80a7('bum): ces ston te/ kau shi ka/ de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan
80b1('bum): yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur
80b2('bum): rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig / yid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid ni/ rang bzhin gyis stong
80b3('bum): ste| yid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang
80b4('bum): yin pa de la ni/ yid rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/ /de la yid nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka/ de ltar
80b5('bum): ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de
80b6('bum): dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha
80b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig / gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs ni/ rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ gzugs kyi rang bzhin
81a1('bum): gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
81a2('bum): pa gang yin pa de la ni/ gzugs rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/ /de la gzugs nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/
81a3('bum): kau shi ka/ de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu
81a4('bum): dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu
81a5('bum): khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig / sgra mi rtag zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sgra ni/ rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ sgra'i
81a6('bum): rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la
81a7('bum): ni| sgra rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/ /de la sgra nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka/ de ltar ston pa'i
81b1('bum): rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems
81b2('bum): dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig /dri
81b3('bum): mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dri ni/ rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ dri'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang
81b4('bum): yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ dri rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/ /de la dri nyid kyang
81b5('bum): med na| rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka /de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan
81b6('bum): mi ston to/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol
81b7('bum): tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig /ro mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig /de ci'i phyir zhe
82a1('bum): na| ro ni/ rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ ro'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi
82a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ ro rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/ /de la ro nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am
82a3('bum): mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka/ de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston
82a4('bum): to| kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha
82a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig /reg mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/
82a6('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ reg ni/ rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ reg gi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha
82a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ reg rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/ /de la reg nyid kyang med na/
82b1('bum): rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka /de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston
82b2('bum): to| |kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
82b3('bum): ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig /chos mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos ni/ rang
82b4('bum): bzhin gyis stong ste/ chos kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
82b5('bum): pa gang yin pa de la ni/ chos rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/ /de la chos nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka/
82b6('bum): de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/ /kau shi ka /gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de
82b7('bum): dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa ba'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol
83a1('bum): tu phyin pa sgoms shig / mig gi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig gi rnam par shes pa
83a2('bum): ni| rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
83a3('bum): ste| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ mig gi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/ /de la mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid
83a4('bum): kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka/ de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs
83a5('bum): brnyan mi ston to/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi

83a7('bum): lta zhig / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni/ rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po
83b1('bum): med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi
83b2('bum): dmigs so/ /de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka/ de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de
83b3('bum): dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu
83b4('bum): dang | rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig /sna'i rnam par
83b5('bum): shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sna'i rnam par shes pa ni/ rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin
83b6('bum): gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ sna'i

84a1('bum): ston te/ kau shi ka/ de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi

84a5('bum): pa'o| |dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ lce'i rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya
84a6('bum): ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/ /de la lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka/ de ltar ston
84a7('bum): pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi
84b1('bum): bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes

84b3('bum): bzhin gyis stong ste/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/

84b5('bum): med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka /de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs
