99a6('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang
99a7('bum): yin pa de la ni/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/ /de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces
99b1('bum): ston te| kau shi ka/ de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang
99b2('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes
99b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig / chen po stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chen po stong pa nyid ni/ rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ chen
99b4('bum): po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin
99b5('bum): pa de la ni/ chen po stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/ /de la chen po stong pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag ba'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau
99b6('bum): shi ka/ de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi
99b7('bum): bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs
100a1('bum): kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig / don dam pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
100a2('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid ni/ rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha
100a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ don dam pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/ /de la don dam pa stong pa nyid
100a4('bum): kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka/ de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs
100a5('bum): brnyan mi ston to/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol
100a6('bum): tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig /'dus byas stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma zhig /de ci'i
100a7('bum): phyir zhe na/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni/ rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes
100b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/ /de la 'dus byas stong
100b2('bum): pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag ba lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka/ de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs
100b3('bum): brnyan mi ston to/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu
100b4('bum): phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig /de ci'i
100b5('bum): phyir zhe na/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni/ rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/
100b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/ /de la 'dus
100b7('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka/ de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
101a1('bum): gzugs brnyan mi ston to/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu
101a2('bum): mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar
101a3('bum): yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni/ rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/
101a4('bum): dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rtag
101a5('bum): ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/ /de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka/ de ltar ston pa'i
101a6('bum): rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/ /ko shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems
101a7('bum): dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig /
101b1('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni/ rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ thog ma dang tha
101b2('bum): ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de
101b3('bum): la ni| thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/ /de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces
101b4('bum): ston te| kau shi ka/ de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu
101b5('bum): mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu
101b6('bum): phyin pa sgoms shig / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni/ rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ dor ba med
101b7('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de
102a1('bum): la ni| dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/ /de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag
102a2('bum): pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka/ de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang
102a3('bum): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu
102a4('bum): khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig / rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni/ rang
102a5('bum): bzhin gyis stong ste/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab
102a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/ /de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa
102a7('bum): lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka/ de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang
102b1('bum): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod
102b2('bum): kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig / chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni/
102b3('bum): rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab
102b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/ /de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag
102b5('bum): pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka/ de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/ kau shi
102b6('bum): ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs
102b7('bum): kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
103a1('bum): ni| rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes
103a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/ /de la rang gi
103a3('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag ba lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka/ de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
103a4('bum): phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes
103a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes
103a6('bum): su ma lta zhig / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni/ rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po
103a7('bum): med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya
103b1('bum): ba mi dmigs so/ de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka/ de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/
103b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi
103b3('bum): bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya
103b4('bum): bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni/ rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po
103b5('bum): med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya
103b6('bum): ba'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/ /de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang med na rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka/ de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am
103b7('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i
104a1('bum): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms
104a2('bum): shig / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni/ rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang
104a3('bum): bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ ngo bo nyid
104a4('bum): stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/ /de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka/ de ltar ston
104a5('bum): pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang
104a6('bum): chub sems dpa'i theg pa ba'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
104a7('bum): sgoms shig / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni/ rang bzhin
104b1('bum): gyis stong ste/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab
104b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/ /de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang
104b3('bum): med na| rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka /de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi
104b4('bum): ston to| |kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
104b5('bum): ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig /de ci'i phyir
104b6('bum): zhe na| dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni/ rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang yin
104b7('bum): pa de ni| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/ /
105a1('bum): de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka/ de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi
105a2('bum): bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs
105a3('bum): kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig /yang dag par spong ba rnams
105a4('bum): mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yang dag par spong ba rnams ni/ rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi rang bzhin gang
105a5('bum): yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ yang dag par spong ba
105a6('bum): rnams rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/ /de la yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka/ de ltar ston
105a7('bum): pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub
105b1('bum): sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig /rdzu
105b2('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni/ rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi rang bzhin
105b3('bum): gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang yin pa de la ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
105b4('bum): rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/ /de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka/ de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi
105b5('bum): bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o gzugs brnyan mi ston to/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa
105b6('bum): pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig /dbang po rnams mi
105b7('bum): rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dbang po rnams ni/ rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ dbang po rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos
106a1('bum): po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ dbang po rnams rtag ces bya ba'am
106a2('bum): mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/ /de la dbang po nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ /kau shi ka/ de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de
106a3('bum): dag ni| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu
106a4('bum): dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig /stobs rnams mi rtag ces bya
106a5('bum): bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stobs rnams ni/ rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po
106a6('bum): med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ stobs rnams rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs
106a7('bum): so| |de la stobs nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka/ de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
106b1('bum): phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi
106b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta
106b3('bum): zhig / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni/ rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang
106b4('bum): yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs
106b5('bum): so| |de la byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ /kau shi ka/ de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha
106b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la
106b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi rtag ces bya bar yang
107a1('bum): dag par rjes su ma lta zhig / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni/ rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
107a2('bum): pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/
107a3('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/ /de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag
107a4('bum): pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka/ de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/ /kau shi ka/
107a5('bum): gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/
107a6('bum): tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
107a7('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni/ rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang yin pa de
107b1('bum): ni| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/ /de la 'phags
107b2('bum): pa'i bden pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka/ de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
107b3('bum): gzugs brnyan mi ston to/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dag la shes rab kyi pha rol
107b4('bum): tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig /bsam gtan rnams mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig /de ci'i phyir
107b5('bum): zhe na| bsam gtan rnams ni/ rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ bsam gtan rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha
107b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ bsam gtan rnams rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/ /de la bsam gtan nyid kyang med na/
107b7('bum): rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka/ de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/ /kau
108a1('bum): shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu
108a2('bum): phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig /tshad med pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig /de ci'i phyir zhe
108a3('bum): na| tshad med pa rnams ni/ rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ tshad med pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
108a4('bum): phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ tshad med pa rnams rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/ /de la tshad med pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am
108a5('bum): mi rtag pa lta ga yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka/ de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan
108a6('bum): yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod
108a7('bum): kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs med
108b1('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni/ rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang yin
108b2('bum): pa de ni| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs
108b3('bum): so| |de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka/ de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag
108b4('bum): ni| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu
108b5('bum): mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig /rnam par thar pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par
108b6('bum): rjes su ma lta zhig / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par thar pa rnams ni/ rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang
108b7('bum): yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ rnam par thar pa rnams rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/ /de
109a1('bum): la rnam par thar pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka/ de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/
109a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi
109a3('bum): bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
109a4('bum): rnams mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni/ rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i
109a5('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang
109a6('bum): yin pa de la ni/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/ /de la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang
109a7('bum): med na| rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka/ de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi
109b1('bum): ston to/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po brgya so drug pa/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i
109b2('bum): theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig /rnam par thar pa'i
109b3('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
109b4('bum): smon pa med pa ni/ rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med
109b5('bum): pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rtag
109b6('bum): ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/ /de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod
109b7('bum): ces ston te/ kau shi ka/ de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang
110a1('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi
110a2('bum): bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig / mngon par shes pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mngon par shes pa rnams ni/
110a3('bum): rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes
110a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ mngon par shes pa rnams rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/ /de la mngon par shes pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am
110a5('bum): mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka/ de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/ /kau shi ka/
110a6('bum): gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs
110a7('bum): kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig / ting nge 'dzin rnams mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin rnams ni/ rang
110b1('bum): bzhin gyis stong ste/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
110b2('bum): phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ ting nge 'dzin rnams rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/ /de la ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/
110b3('bum): kau shi ka/ de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu
110b4('bum): mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu
110b5('bum): phyin pa sgoms shig / gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni/ rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi
110b6('bum): rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams
110b7('bum): rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/ /de la gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka/ de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am
111a1('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub
111a2('bum): sems dpa' theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig /
111a3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni/ rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de
111a4('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
111a5('bum): pa gang yin pa de la ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am
111a6('bum): mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka/ de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan
111a7('bum): yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu
111b1('bum): khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig / mi 'jigs pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi 'jigs pa rnams ni/ rang bzhin gyis
111b2('bum): stong ste| mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
111b3('bum): gang yin pa de la ni/ mi 'jigs pa rnams rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/ /de la mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/
111b4('bum): kau shi ka/ de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo
111b5('bum): de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
111b6('bum): sgoms shig / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni/ rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ so so
111b7('bum): yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang
112a1('bum): yin pa de la ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/ /de la so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang med na/
112a2('bum): rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka/ de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/ /
112a3('bum): kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar
112a4('bum): ston te| tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ snying rje chen po mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ snying rje chen
112a5('bum): po ni| rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes
112a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ snying rje chen po rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/ /de la snying rje chen po nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta
112a7('bum): ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka/ de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan
112b1('bum): yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu
112b2('bum): khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
112b3('bum): ma 'dres pa rnams ni/ rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes
112b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/ /de la
112b5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka/ de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha
112b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la
112b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig /rgyun du zhugs ba'i 'bras bu mi rtag cas bya bar yang dag par rjes
113a1('bum): su ma lta zhig / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni/ rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/
113a2('bum): dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rtag
113a3('bum): ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/ /de la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka/ de ltar ston
113a4('bum): pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang
113a5('bum): chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
113a6('bum): pa sgoms shig / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni/ rang
113a7('bum): bzhin gyis stong ste/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
113b1('bum): pa ste| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/ /de la lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
113b2('bum): bu nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka/ de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs
113b3('bum): brnyan mi ston to/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
113b4('bum): pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig /de ci'i phyir
113b5('bum): zhe na| phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni/ rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes
113b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/ /de la phyir mi 'ong ba'i
113b7('bum): 'bras bu nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka/ de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs
114a1('bum): brnyan mi ston to/ kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs
114a2('bum): kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig /dgra bcom pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar
114a3('bum): yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dgra bcom pa nyid ni/ rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /
114a4('bum): dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ dgra bcom nyid rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya ba
114a5('bum): mi dmigs so/ /de la dgra bcom pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka/ de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/
114a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang
114a7('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig /rang byang chub mi rtag ces bya bar yang
114b1('bum): dag par rjes su ma lta zhig / de ci'i phyir zhen/ rang byang chub ni/ rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang yin
114b2('bum): pa de ni| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ rang byang chub rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/ /de la rang byang chub
114b3('bum): nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka/ de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs
114b4('bum): brnyan mi ston to/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
114b5('bum): pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig /de ci'i phyir
114b6('bum): zhe na| lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni/ rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes
114b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/ /de la lam gyi rnam pa shes
115a1('bum): pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka/ de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha
115a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la
115a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag
115a4('bum): par rjes su ma lta zhig / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni/ rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po
115a5('bum): med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtag ces
115a6('bum): bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/ /de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka/ de ltar ston pa'i rigs
115a7('bum): kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems
115b1('bum): dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig /chos
115b2('bum): gang las kyang yongs su 'da' bar ma byed cig / chos gang la'ang gnas par ma byed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chos gang las 'da' bar
115b3('bum): bya ba'am gang la gnas par bya ba'i chos de la med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni/ rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i chos gang
115b4('bum): yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ blang bar bya ba'am/ dor
115b5('bum): bar bya ba'am/ bskyed par bya ba'am/ dgag par bya ba'i chos gang yang med do/ /zhes ston te/ kau shi ka/ de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha
115b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/ /kau shi ka/ de bas na/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don bstan par bya ste/ kau shi ka/ de ltar
115b7('bum): ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po ni/ ches mang du 'phel gyi/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo snga ma dag gi ni/ ma yin no/ /kau shi ka/gzhan
116a1('bum): yang dzam+bu gling gi sems can ji snyed par dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka/ de ji
116a2('bum): snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang ngo / /bcom
116a3('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka/ de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya
116a4('bum): cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
116a5('bum): pa zungs shig / kun chub par gyis shig /chongs shig /lhogs shig /tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang la nan tan du gyis
116a6('bum): shig / ces bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod par 'gyur ro/ /
116a7('bum): kau shi ka/ dzam+bu gling gi sems can lta zhog go/ kau shi ka/ gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis
116b1('bum): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka/ de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
116b2('bum): mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka/ de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don
116b3('bum): dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs
116b4('bum): kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zungs shig / kun chub par gyis shig /chongs shig/ lhogs shig /tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig /ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol
116b5('bum): tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod
116b6('bum): par 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka/ gling chen po pa bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams gyi sems can rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta zhog gi /kau shi ka/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur
116b7('bum): bu'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka/ de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs
117a1('bum): kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang ngo / /bcom ldan
117a2('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka/ de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher
117a3('bum): brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu
117a4('bum): phyin pa zungs shig / kun chub par gyis shig /chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig /ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis
117a5('bum): shig ces bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod par 'gyur ro/ /kau
117a6('bum): shi ka| stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta zhog gi / kau shi ka/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems
117a7('bum): can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka/ de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo
117b1('bum): de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka/ de bas
117b2('bum): kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam
117b3('bum): par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zungs shig /kun chub par gyis shig /chongs shig/
117b4('bum): lhogs shig /tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig /ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan gyis shig ces bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i
117b5('bum): phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod par 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can rgyun du
117b6('bum): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta zhog gi / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rgyun du
117b7('bum): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka/ de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
118a1('bum): 'das| mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka/ de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo
118a2('bum): gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang
118a3('bum): dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zungs shig /kun chub par gyis shig /chongs shig/ lhogs shig /tshul
118a4('bum): bzhin du yid la gyis shig / ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig /ces bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe
118a5('bum): na| kau shi ka/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod par 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can
118a6('bum): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta zhog gi / kau shi ka/ phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs
118a7('bum): kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka/ de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i
118b1('bum): rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka/ de bas kyang rigs kyi
118b2('bum): bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste
118b3('bum): gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zungs shig /kun chub par gyis shig /chongs shig /lhogs
118b4('bum): shig / tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig /ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig /ces bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/ /de'i ci'i
118b5('bum): phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod par 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang dzam+bu gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi
118b6('bum): bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka/ de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyas mang du 'phel
118b7('bum): lam| gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka/ de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo
119a1('bum): gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par
119a2('bum): phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zungs shig /kun chub par gyis shig /chongs shig /
119a3('bum): lhogs shig /tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig /ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig /ces bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/ /
119a4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod par 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka/ dzam+bu gling gi sems can lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i
119a5('bum): 'bras bu la bkod pa lta zhog gi / gling chen po pa bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed bde dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i
119a6('bum): 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka/ de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
119a7('bum): mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka/ de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
119b1('bum): pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di
119b2('bum): skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zungs shig / kun chub par gyis shig /chongs shig /lhogs shig /tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig /ji ltar bstan
119b3('bum): pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig / ces bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
119b4('bum): las lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod par 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka/ gling chen po pa bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta
119b5('bum): zhog gi / stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/ kau
119b6('bum): shi ka/ de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang
119b7('bum): ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka/ de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par
120a1('bum): gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs
120a2('bum): kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zungs shig / kun chub par gyis shig /chongs shig /lhogs shig /tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig /ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab
120a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ ces bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las lan
120a4('bum): gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod par 'gyur ro/ kau shi ka/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta zhog gi /stong
120a5('bum): gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka/
120a6('bum): de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs
120a7('bum): pa| mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka/ de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge
120b1('bum): dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod
120b2('bum): kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zungs shig / kun chub par gyis shig /chongs shig /lhogs shig /tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig /ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu
120b3('bum): phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig / ces bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las lan gcig phyir
120b4('bum): 'od ba rnams yod par 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta zhog gi /stong gsum gyi
120b5('bum): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka/
120b6('bum): de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang ngo / /bcom
120b7('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka/ de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher

121a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ ces bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ /kau shi ka/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las lan

121a5('bum): b cu'i phyogs re re zhing gang+gA'i klung gi phye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis lan gcig phyir

121b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par bye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas

127a5('bum): zhe na| kau shi ka/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las dgra bcom pa rnams yod par 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang dzam+bu gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am
127a6('bum): rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rang byang chub la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka/ de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/
127a7('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka/ de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang
127b1('bum): gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag
127b2('bum): par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zungs shig /kun chub par gyis shig /chongs shig/ lhogs shig /tshul bzhin du
127b3('bum): yid la gyis shig / ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ ces bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/
127b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rang sangs rgyas rnams yod par 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka/ dzam+bu gling gi sems can rang byang chub la bkod pa lta zhog gi /kau shi ka/ gling chen
127b5('bum): po pa bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rang byang chub la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka/ de ji snyam du sems/
127b6('bum): rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das
127b7('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka/ de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa
128a1('bum): dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / /yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol
128a2('bum): tu phyin pa zungs shig / kun chub par gyis shig /chongs shig/ lhogs shig /tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig /ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du
128a3('bum): gyis shig/ ces bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rang sangs rgyas rnams yod par 'gyur ro/ /
128a4('bum): kau shi ka/ gling chen po pa bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rang byang chub la bkod pa lta zhog gi /stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs
128a5('bum): kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rang byang chub la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka/ de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel
128a6('bum): lam| gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka/ de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo
128a7('bum): gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang
128b1('bum): dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zungs shig /kun chub par gyis shig /chongs shig/ lhogs shig /tshul bzhin du

129a2('bum): nan tan du gyis shig/ ces bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rang sangs rgyas rnams yod

129a6('bum): rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam

130a6('bum): brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

130b2('bum): bu| khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur ba de'i tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen

132b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur
133a1('bum): pa de'i tshe khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom ba de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom

133b6('bum): 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de'i tshe khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
133b7('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /zhes bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ 'di las byung ba ni/ sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
134a1('bum): chen po rnams so/ /kau shi ka/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang
134a2('bum): dag par bskul ba byas pa lta zhog gi / kau shi ka/ phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am

134a4('bum): de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi
134a5('bum): ka/ de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de
134a6('bum): bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zungs shig /kun chub
134a7('bum): par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig /tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig /ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig /rigs kyi bu/ khyod
134b1('bum): gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bstan pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe rigs kyi bu/ khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod gang gi
134b2('bum): tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro/ /gang gi che khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos
134b3('bum): rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas
134b4('bum): kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de'i tshe khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /zhes bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel
134b5('bum): lo| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ 'di las byung ba ni/ sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams so/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang dzam+bu gling gi sems
134b6('bum): can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod na/ kau shi ka/ de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams
134b7('bum): de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka/ de bas kyang rigs
135a1('bum): kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /
135a2('bum): bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zungs shig /kun
135a3('bum): chub par gyis shig / chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig /ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan tu gyis shig /rigs kyi bu/
135a4('bum): khyod gang gi tshe ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe rigs kyi bu/ khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod
135a5('bum): gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
135a6('bum): kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom
135a7('bum): pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de'i tshe khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /zhes bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang
135b1('bum): du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ 'di las byung ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'o/ /kau shi ka/ dzam+bu gling gi sems can rnams
135b2('bum): phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod pa lta zhog gi / gling chen po pa bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis phyir mi ldog pa'i
135b3('bum): sa la bkod na/ kau shi ka/ de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang ngo / /bde bar
135b4('bum): gshegs pa/ mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka/ de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/
135b5('bum): yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu
135b6('bum): khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zungs shig / kun chub par gyis shig /chongs shig/ lhogs shig /tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu
135b7('bum): phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig / rigs kyi bu/ khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bstan pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
136a1('bum): slob par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams
136a2('bum): thob par 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs
136a3('bum): par 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de'i tshe khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
136a4('bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /zhes bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ 'di las byung ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
136a5('bum): chen po rnams kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'o/ /kau shi ka/ gling chen po pa bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod pa lta zhog gi /kau shi ka/ stong
136a6('bum): gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod na/ kau shi ka/ de ji snyam du sems/
136a7('bum): rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis
136b1('bum): bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka/ de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan
136b2('bum): pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zungs shig /
136b3('bum): kun chub par gyis shig /chongs shig/ lhogs shig /tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig /ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig /rigs kyi bu/
136b4('bum): khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bstan pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod gang gi tshe
136b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams
136b6('bum): thob par gyur pa de'i tshe khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /zhes bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir
136b7('bum): zhe na| kau shi ka/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las byung ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'o/ /kau shi ka/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi
137a1('bum): khams byur bu'i sems can phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod pa lta zhog gi / stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag
137a2('bum): rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod na/ kau shi ka/ de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang
137a3('bum): du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka/ de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am
137a4('bum): rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par bye ste gsal
137a5('bum): ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zungs shig /kun chub par gyis shig /chongs shig/ lhogs
137a6('bum): shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig /ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig /rigs kyi bu/ khyod gang gi tshe ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi
137a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
137b1('bum): slob par gyur pa de'i tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe khyod bla
137b2('bum): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /zhes bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ shes rab kyi
137b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'o/ /kau shi ka/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring bo'i sems can
137b4('bum): phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod pa lta zhog gi / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed bde dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis phyir mi
137b5('bum): ldog pa'i sa la bkod na/ kau shi ka/ de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang ngo / /bde
137b6('bum): bar gshegs pa/ mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka/ de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/

138a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zungs shig / kun chub par gyis shig /chongs shig/ lhogs shig /tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig /ji ltar bstan
138a2('bum): pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig / rigs kyi bu/ khyod gang gi tshe ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe rigs kyi bu khyod
138a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob bar gyur pa de'i tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
138a4('bum): chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
138a5('bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /zhes bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las byung ba ni/ byang chub
138a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'o/ /kau shi ka/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod pa lta
138a7('bum): zhog gi / kau shi ka/ phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis phyir
138b1('bum): mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod na/ kau shi ka/ de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang ngo / /
138b2('bum): bde bar gshegs pa/ mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka/ de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang

138b5('bum): pa la nan tan du gyis shig / rigs kyi bu/ khyod gang gi tshe ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob
138b6('bum): par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa pa'i tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe
138b7('bum): khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /zhes bsgo na/ ches de'i
139a1('bum): bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las byung ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
139a2('bum): chen po rnams kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'o/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang dzam+bu gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par
139a3('bum): zhugs par gyur te/ de dag la rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan
139a4('bum): pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zungs shig /

139a7('bum): gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
139b1('bum): chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /zhes bsgo na/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i
139b2('bum): bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /kau shi ka/ dzam+bu gling gi sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur pa lta zhog gi /kau shi ka/ gling
139b3('bum): bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur te/ de dag la rigs kyi bu'am rigs
139b4('bum): kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba
139b5('bum): dang | yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zungs shig /kun chub par gyis shig /chongs shig/ lhogs shig /
