140a1('bum): khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe

140a5('bum): kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba

140b2('bum): khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
140b3('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /zhes bsgo na/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /kau shi ka/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams
140b4('bum): byur bu'i sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur pa lta zhog gi / kau shi ka/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i
140b5('bum): sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur te/ de dag la rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis
140b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan
140b7('bum): pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zungs shig /kun chub par gyis shig /chongs shig/ lhogs shig /tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig /
141a1('bum): ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig /rigs kyi bu/ khyod gang gi tshe ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu
141a2('bum): phyin pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe rigs kyi bu/ khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par
141a3('bum): gyur pa de'i tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe khyod bla na
141a4('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /zhes bsgo na/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /kau shi
141a5('bum): ka| stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur pa lta zhog gi / kau shi ka/
141a6('bum): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur te/ de
141a7('bum): dag la rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de
141b1('bum): bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zungs shig /kun chub par gyis
141b2('bum): shig |chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig /ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig /rigs kyi bu/ khyod gang gi tshe shes
141b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bstan pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe rigs kyi bu/ khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha
141b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur
141b5('bum): pa de'i tshe khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /zhes bsgo na/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel
141b6('bum): lo| |kau shi ka/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur pa lta zhog gi /

142a1('bum): yang dag par zhugs par gyur te/ de dag la rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang
142a2('bum): ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis
142a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zungs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig /chongs shig/ lhogs shig /tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig /ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
142a4('bum): pa la nan tan du gyis shig / rigs kyi bu/ khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bstan pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe rigs kyi bu/ khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

142a7('bum): bsgo na| rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang dzam+bu gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang
142b1('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol
142b2('bum): tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa bas/ de'i
142b3('bum): nang nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la zhig / 'di skad du bdag myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /zhes zer la/
142b4('bum): rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rgya cher bstan na/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod
142b5('bum): nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /kau shi ka/ dzam+bu gling gi sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur pa lta zhog gi /kau shi ka/ gling bzhi
142b6('bum): pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

145a1('bum): kyi| 'di ni/ 'khor ba las byung bar 'dod la snying rje chen pos mnar ba'i phyir ro/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di

145a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o/ /de lta de ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

145b6('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o/ /de lta de ltar mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o/ /de lta de ltar dngos po

146a1('bum): stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o/ /de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la

146b5('bum): kyang rjes su bzung bar bgyi ste/ byang chub sems dba' sems dpa' chen po de la chos kyis bsdu ba dang / zang zing gis bsdu bas rjes su 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo
146b6('bum): de dag gi bsod nams ches mang du 'phel gyi/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo snga ma dag gi ni/ ma lags so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ yong yang de ltar

147b1('bum): shing rjes su bstan pa'o/ /mi dmigs ba stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o/ /dngos po med pa stong ba nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid

148a3('bum): shing rjes su bstan pa'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o/ /byams pa chen po la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o/ /snying rje chen po la
148a4('bum): gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres ba bco brgyad la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin
148a5('bum): la smras pa/ kau shi ka/ khyod de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mos pa bskyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan 'dogs pa dang / yongs su skyob pa legs
148a6('bum): so| |legs so/ /kau shi ka/ khyod kyis de bzhin du bya'o/ /'phags pa nyan thos gang sems can rnams la phan 'dogs par 'dod ba des kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
148a7('bum): chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mos pa bskyed par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams zang zing dang cos kyis phan gdags pas phan gdags shing
148b1('bum): yongs su bskyang bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las 'byung
148b2('bum): ngo / /gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems mi bskyed na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha
148b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes
148b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag la slob pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /
148b5('bum): chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong ba nyid dang / 'dus byas stong ba nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med
148b6('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong ba nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /
148b7('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong ba nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu
149a1('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /
149a2('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar
149a3('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams
149a4('bum): dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
149a5('bum): 'dres pa bco brgyad la slob pa ma yin te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
149a6('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur na/ rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos rnams kyang yong par mi 'gyur te/ kau shi ka/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
149a7('bum): dpa' chen po ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam
149b1('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag la'ang slob la/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa
149b2('bum): nyid dang | stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa
149b3('bum): stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid
149b4('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong ba nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran
149b5('bum): pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /
149b6('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa
149b7('bum): rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa
150a1('bum): dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs
150a2('bum): pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la'ang slob pas/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na
150a3('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs ba'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /
150a4('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can dmyal ba rnams kyang rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/ /byol song gi skye gnas rnams kyang rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/ /gshin rje'i 'jig rten
150a5('bum): rnams kyang rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/ /lha ma yin gyi ris kyang yongs su 'grib bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i ris kyang mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams
150a6('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung
150a7('bum): bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /sum cu rtsa gsum kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams 'jig
150b1('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha
150b2('bum): rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /tshangs pa kun
150b3('bum): 'khor gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /chung
150b4('bum): snang gi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur
150b5('bum): ro| |dge ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /chung dge'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /
150b6('bum): dge rgyas kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /chung che'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /tshad med che
150b7('bum): ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mi che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mi
151a1('bum): gdung ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams
151a2('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'og min gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /
151a3('bum): rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'du shes med
151a4('bum): 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

151a6('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar
151a7('bum): 'gyur ro/ /phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
151b1('bum): chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'dus ma byas
151b2('bum): stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong ba nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur
151b3('bum): ro| |dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /chos thams rang stang pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /
151b4('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar
151b5('bum): 'gyur ro/ /ngo bo nyid stong ba nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong ba nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag ba rnams 'jig
151b6('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par sbong ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dbang bo rnams 'jig rten du
151b7('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
152a1('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar
152a2('bum): 'gyur ro/ /tshad med pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ rnam par thar pa brgyad

152a6('bum): 'gyur ro/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /snying rje chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
152a7('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos kyi theg pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /theg pa chen po 'jig
152b1('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ brgya byin gyi le'u ste/ nyi shu gsum ba'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong
152b2('bum): phrag brgya ba/ /bam bo brgya so brgyad pa/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas gnas brtan rab 'byor la smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems
152b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams bya ba'i
152b4('bum): dngos po sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ de mi dmigs ba'i tshul gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba gang yin pa dang / sems
152b5('bum): can thams cad kyi rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi sbyin
152b6('bum): pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa dag las/ byang
152b7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par
153a1('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa 'di nyid rab ces bya'o/ /dam pa zhes bya'o/ /gtso bo zhes bya'o/ /mchog ces bya'o/ /phul zhes bya'o/ /
153a2('bum): gya nom pa zhes bya'o/ /bla na med pa zhes bya'o/ /gong na med pa zhes bya'o/ /mnyam pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
153a3('bum): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / bsgoms ba las byung ba'i
153a4('bum): bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po ni/ bdag gdul ba dang / bdag zhi bar bya ba dang / bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag
153a5('bum): pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags
153a6('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /

153b1('bum): yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa drug dag kyang bdag gdul ba dang / bdag zhi bar bya ba dang / bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir nye bar gnas par
153b2('bum): zad kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad gdul ba dang / zhi bar bya ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya
153b3('bum): ba'i dngos po sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs ba'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o/ /de nas tshe dang
153b4('bum): ldan pa rab 'byor gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shar phyogs kyi
153b5('bum): ' jig rten gyi khams grangs med tshad med dpag tu med bdag gi 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med tshad med pa yongs su mya ngan las
153b6('bum): 'das par gyur pa de dag dang / lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med tshad med dpag tu med pa dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs
153b7('bum): med tshad med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de dag dang / nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med tshad med dpag tu med pa dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams re rer
154a1('bum): yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med tshad med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de dag dang / byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams

154a3('bum): dag dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med tshad med dpag tu med pa dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs

154a5('bum): khams re rer yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med tshad med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de dag dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
154a6('bum): g rangs med tshad med dpag tu med pa dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med tshad med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de dag
154a7('bum): dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med tshad med dpag tu med pa dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med
154b1('bum): tshad med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de dag dang / 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med tshad med dpag tu med pa dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang
154b2('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med tshad med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de dag dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med tshad med dpag tu med pa
154b3('bum): d ag gis 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med tshad med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de dag thugs dang po bskyed pa nas bla na med pa yang
154b4('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar dang / phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar gyi dam
154b5('bum): pa'i chos nub kyi bar du dge ba'i rtsa ba pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa gang ji snyed cig yod pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa de dag gis sbyin pa las byung
154b6('bum): ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / slob pa de dag
154b7('bum): gi dge ba'i rtsa ba zag pa med pa dag dang / mi slob pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba zag pa med pa dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
155a1('bum): @#/ rgyas de dag gi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i
155a2('bum): ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po dang / phan par bzhed pa dang / thugs rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos grangs med tshad med pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos
155a3('bum): gang bstan pa dang / chos bstan pa de la bslab cing rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa
155a4('bum): dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa dang / rang byang chub thob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la zhugs pa de dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa dang / gang gis de
155a5('bum): bzhin gshegs pa de dag bzhugs kyang rung / yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang rung ste/ de dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig bskyed pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus
155a6('bum): te rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog/ gtso bo/ dam pa/ rab/ phul/ gya nom pa/ bla na med pa/ gong na med pa/ mnyam pa med pa/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas rjes su yi rang ba
155a7('bum): s te| de ltar rjes su yi rang nas rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po des sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
155b1('bum): pa'i byang chub grub par gyur cig/ ces bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa des de skad
155b2('bum): du smras te sems kyi rnam pa de lta bus yongs su bsngos na/ dmigs pa gang dang / dngos po gang gis sems de lta bu skyes par gyur pa'i dngos po de dag dang / dmigs pa de dag rigs kyi
155b3('bum): bu de dag gis ji ltar mtshan mar byas pa de bzhin du dmigs pa yod pa yin nam/ byams pas smras pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu de dag gis ji ltar mtshan
155b4('bum): mar byas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa de bzhin du dngos po de dag dang / dmigs pa de dag dmigs su yod pa ma yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis
155b5('bum): smras pa| gal te de ltar dngos po med pa dag dmigs pa med pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa de dag dang / de dag gi thugs dang
155b6('bum): po bskyed pa nas dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa
155b7('bum): ba gang ji snyed pa dang / slob pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa dang / mi slob ba rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus te bla na med pa yang dag
156a1('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mtshan ma'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngos na/ ji ltar mi rtag pa la rtag go/ zhes bya bar 'du shes phyin ci log dang / sems
156a2('bum): phyin ci log dang / lta ba phyin ci log tu gyur pa dang / sdug bsngal ba la bde zhes bya bar 'du shes phyin ci log dang / sems phyin ci log dang / lta ba phyin ci log tu gyur pa
156a3('bum): dang / bdag med pa la bdag ces bya bar 'du shes phyin ci log dang / sems phyin ci log dang / lta ba phyin ci log tu gyur pa dang / mi gtsang ba la gtsang ba zhes bya bar 'du
156a4('bum): shes phyin ci log dang / sems phyin ci log dang / lta ba phyin ci log tu gyur pa dang / de ltar de'i 'du shes phyin ci log tu ma gyur tam/ de ltar yin yang thams cad dngos
156a5('bum): po ji lta ba dang / dmigs pa ji lta bar byang chub kyang de bzhin/ sems kyang de bzhin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de bzhin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod
156a6('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de bzhin/ gzugs dang / tshor
156a7('bum): pa dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'ang de bzhin/ mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang de bzhin/ gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri
156b1('bum): dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos kyang de bzhin/ khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'ang de bzhin/ nang stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ phyi
156b2('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/
156b3('bum): 'dus ma byas stong ba nyid kyang de bzhin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ rang
156b4('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ dngos po med pa
156b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang de bzhin/ yang dag par
156b6('bum): spong ba rnams kyang de bzhin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang de bzhin/ dbang po rnams kyang de bzhin/ stobs rnams kyang de bzhin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang de bzhin/ 'phags
156b7('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang de bzhin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang de bzhin/ bsam gtan rnams kyang de bzhin/ tshad med pa rnams kyang de bzhin/ gzugs med pa'i
157a1('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang de bzhin/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang de bzhin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'ang de bzhin/
157a2('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang de bzhin/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyang de bzhin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang de bzhin/ gzungs
157a3('bum): kyi sgo rnams kyang de bzhin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'ang de bzhin/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi'ang de bzhin/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'ang de bzhin/ sangs rgyas kyi
157a4('bum): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang de bzhin te/ gal te de ltar dngos po ji lta ba dang / dmigs pa ji lta bar byang chub kyang de bzhin/ sems kyang de bzhin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
157a5('bum): pa'ang de bzhin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de bzhin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de bzhin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de bzhin/ bsam gtan gyi pha
157a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa'ang de bzhin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de bzhin/ nang stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ phyi nang stong ba nyid kyang de bzhin/ stong
157a7('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang de
157b1('bum): bzhin| mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ thog ma dang tham med pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/
157b2('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ ngo bo nyid
157b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang de bzhin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang de bzhin/ rdzu 'phrul
157b4('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams kyang de bzhin/ dbang po rnams kyang de bzhin/ stobs rnams kyang de bzhin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang de bzhin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang
157b5('bum): de bzhin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang de bzhin/ bsam gtan rnams kyang de bzhin/ tshad med pa rnams kyang de bzhin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang de
157b6('bum): bzhin| rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang de bzhin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'ang de bzhin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med
157b7('bum): pa'ang de bzhin/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyang de bzhin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang de bzhin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang de bzhin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'ang de bzhin/ mi
158a1('bum): 'jigs pa bzhi'ang de bzhin/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'ang de bzhin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang de bzhin na ni/ bla na
158a2('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'i dngos po de ni/ gang zhig yin/ dmigs pa de ni/ gang zhig yin/ byang chub de ni/ gang zhig yin/ sems de
158a3('bum): ni| gang zhig yin/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag ni/ gang zhig yin/ rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de ni/ gang zhig yin/ byams pas smras pa/ gal
158a4('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod spyod pa/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur cing dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par gyur pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis
158a5('bum): kyang yongs su zin pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong ba'i chos thams cad la bslab pa dag ni/ dngos po de dag dang / dmigs ba de dag dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan
158a6('bum): 'das de dag dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de dag mtshan mar byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
158a7('bum): byang chub tu yongs su mi bsngo'o/ /de dag ni/ 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ gnyis kyi tshul gyis ma yin no/ /gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis ma yin no/ /mtshan ma'i tshul gyis
158b1('bum): ma yin no/ /mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis ma yin no/ /dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin no/ /dmigs su med pa'i tshul gyis ma yin no/ /nyon mongs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin
158b2('bum): no| |rnam par byang ba'i tshul gyis ma yin no/ /skye ba'i tshul gyis ma yin no/ /'gag pa'i tshul gyis ma yin no/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa' de dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la
158b3('bum): spyod spyod pa'ang ma yin/ /sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byed byed pa'ang ma yin/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par gyur pa'ang ma yin/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin
158b4('bum): pa'ang ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la bslab par gyur pa'ang ma yin na/ de dag ni/ dngos po de dag dang / dmigs pa de dag dang / sangs rgyas
158b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan ba'i sems bskyed pa de dag la mtshan mar byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
158b6('bum): pa'i byang chub tu bsngo bar 'gyur te/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar bstan pa ni/ theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun
158b7('bum): du mi bshad do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar bstan pa ni/ theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do/ /brtson 'grus kyi
159a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar bstan pa ni/ theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de
159a2('bum): ltar bstan pa ni/ theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar bstan pa ni/ theg pa la gsar du
159a3('bum): zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar bstan pa ni/ theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du
159a4('bum): mi bshad do/ /nang stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni/ theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do/ /phyi stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni/ theg pa
159a5('bum): la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni/ theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do/ /
159a6('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni/ theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do/ /chen po stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni/ theg pa la
159a7('bum): gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni/ theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun
159b1('bum): du mi bshad do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni/ theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid de ltar bstan

159b4('bum): med pa stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni/ theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni/ theg pa la gsar
159b5('bum): du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni/ theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi
159b6('bum): bshad do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni/ theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid de ltar
159b7('bum): bstan pa ni/ theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni/ theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang
160a1('bum): chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni/ theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
160a2('bum): mdun du mi bshad do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni/ theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do/ /dran pa nye bar

160b2('bum): pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do/ /tshad med pa rnams de ltar bstan pa ni/ theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du

160b6('bum): pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams de ltar bstan pa ni/ theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems

161a1('bum): de ltar bstan pa ni/ theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu de ltar

161a4('bum): snying rje chen po de ltar bstan pa ni/ theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad de ltar bstan pa
